sentences.en: Any surplus can be trimmed away.
sentences.cn: 多出来的部分可以修剪掉。

sentences.en: Brazil has a big surplus of coffee.

sentences.cn: 埃塞俄比亚没有多余的食物。

sentences.en: Few people have large sums of surplus cash.
Harry made a packet after the war selling surplus army blankets.
sentences.cn: 战后,哈里靠出售剩余的军用毛毯赚了一大笔钱.

sentences.en: I sell my surplus birds to a local pet shop.
sentences.cn: 我把多余的鸟卖给当地的宠物商店。

sentences.en: It's an essay heavy with surplus phrasing.
sentences.cn: 这是篇废话连篇的散文.

sentences.en: Portugal will probably have a small current-account surplus for 1992.
sentences.cn: 葡萄牙1992年经常项目可能会出现小额顺差。

sentences.en: Surplus equipment should be turned over to the higher authorities.
The country's trade surplus widened to 16.5 billion dollars.
sentences.cn: 该国的贸易顺差增加到165亿美元。

sentences.en: The doctrine of surplus value is the cornerstone of Marx's economic theory.
sentences.cn: 剩余价值学说是马克思经济理论的基石.

sentences.en: The houses are being sold because they are surplus to requirements.
sentences.cn: 这些因超出需求而闲置着的房子正在出售。

sentences.en: The invisible trade surplus was £200 million lower than reported.
sentences.cn: 无形贸易盈余比报道所称的少2亿英镑。

sentences.en: The kids were running around crazily , working off their surplus energy.
sentences.cn: 孩子们到处疯跑消耗过剩的精力.

sentences.en: The reckoning up of revenue and expenditure shows a small surplus.
The surplus steam was blown off through the pipes.
sentences.cn: 多余的蒸气通过管道放掉了.

sentences.en: Wheat was in surplus that year.

words.tran_cn: [数]剩余；[贸易]顺差；[会计]盈余；[电子][经]过剩

phrases.tran_cn: 国际收支经常项目顺差
n. 溢水；水盈值；剩余水量

trans.tran_en: more than what is needed or used

trans.tran_cn: 剩余额，公积金，顺差，盈余
trans.tran_en: an amount of something that is more than what is needed or used
